thread.title: Border Collie Puppy Who Never Had Seen A Sheep Before Herds Four Fearlessly
thread.title_full: Border Collie Puppy Who Never Had Seen A Sheep Before Herds Four Fearlessly

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Border Collie Puppy Who Never Had Seen A Sheep Before Herds Four Fearlessly
text:
Border Collie Puppy Who Never Had Seen A Sheep Before Herds Four Fearlessly   
A fearless Border Collie puppy was caught on camera herding sheep four times her size like a pro – despite never laying eyes on the animals before. 
In this adorable short clip, Ciara, a 7-week-old Border Collie puppy, jumps right in to learn her job and shows four large sheep who’s boss. Although Ciara had never seen a sheep before this moment, her human Daire Byrne said her instincts as a fifth-generation sheep dog kicked in the moment she clapped eyes on them. 
Share this cute video with your family and friends.   Like Us On Facebook!
